item.title: iTerm2 features I find useful
item.description: iTerm2 features I find useful Show Timestamps ==> ⌘+Shift+E Alert on next prompt ==> ⌘+Option+A Jump between prompts ==> ⌘+Shift+Down Hotkeys to scroll one line at a time ==> ⌘+Up and ⌘+Down Rearrange tabs with hotkeys ==> Ctrl+Shift+B and Ctrl+Shift+F
